column4: its a plasma widget, to re-add I believe you just click the activity button on the top right and click add widget. I think the widget you are talking about is called folder view
dont quote me on that though I haven't used kde in a while :)

yes, I only JUST found out. "Folder View" indeed. I went through the list of widgets but without knowing exactly what I was looking for it was hard. Another way, I just found out, of getting it back is to go to Dolphin and drag the dektop folder to desktop and when prompted choose folder view
